page.title: 06OPEN_AIR MARKET
page.content: This open-air trading market is held every Thurday,and started in 1982.It's situated in the main carpark.There are 30 stalls-sweets,cards,clothes,cakes, flowers,meat,fruit and vegetables. They get their goods straight from the factories,so they can sell things cheaper.The traders pay about Â£20 weekly to trade and go to a different market every day around London.They have a poor time after Christmas but compensate in the summer. The public prefer to shop there because they like{bargains}and like to wander and browse....by Sarah Galloway
